page.title: 02ATTITUDES.CALCOT,READING
page.content: As the Calcot Area is growing so fast people have not had time to form hardened attitudes to new developments.However,after the initial objections,most people feel that the new Savacentre hypermarket is a good thing,since it provides jobs and excellent shopping facilities.Some people mourn the loss of the 'Corner shop'.Bus transport is felt to be adequate.Most people are pleased with the ease of movement afforded by the A4 and M4.There is mixed feeling about the new mini-roundabouts.Local people are concerned about the rapid growth in housing,and it's affect on the environment.The new 'Wheelie bins' for household rubbish disposal are well received.Most people feel there should be more facilities for the growing population.
